name: SEED001
description: SEED001 is a 2D, 3D platformer puzzle game that attempts to explore Unity's wide array of tools in a dystopian Sci-Fi setting. Who is SEED? What do they seek? In a restrained 3d world with scattered objects in ruins, danger lurks in the shadows, as so does opportunity. Traverse through dimensions to explore this world of simple geometry, where you'll find there's a lot more that meets the eye.
